description: View a summary of operations metadata (OpsData) based on specified filters and aggregators. OpsData can include information about Amazon Web Services Systems Manager OpsCenter operational workitems (OpsItems) as well as information about any Amazon Web Services resource or service configured to report OpsData to Amazon Web Services Systems Manager Explorer.

parameters.name: Filters
parameters.description: Optional filters used to scope down the returned OpsData. (dict) --- A filter for viewing OpsData summaries. The name of the filter. The filter value. (string) --- Type (string) --- The type of filter.

parameters.name: Aggregators
parameters.description: Optional aggregators that return counts of OpsData based on one or more expressions. (dict) --- One or more aggregators for viewing counts of OpsData using different dimensions such as Source, CreatedTime, or Source and CreatedTime, to name a few. AggregatorType (string) --- Either a Range or Count aggregator for limiting an OpsData summary. TypeName (string) --- The data type name to use for viewing counts of OpsData. AttributeName (string) --- The name of an OpsData attribute on which to limit the count of OpsData. Values (dict) --- The aggregator value. (string) --- (string) --- Filters (list) --- The aggregator filters. (dict) --- A filter for viewing OpsData summaries. The name of the filter. The filter value. (string) --- Type (string) --- The type of filter. Aggregators (list) --- A nested aggregator for viewing counts of OpsData.

nested_params.name: AggregatorType
nested_params.description: Either a Range or Count aggregator for limiting an OpsData summary.

nested_params.name: TypeName
nested_params.description: The data type name to use for viewing counts of OpsData.

nested_params.name: AttributeName
nested_params.description: The name of an OpsData attribute on which to limit the count of OpsData.

nested_params.name: Aggregators
nested_params.description: A nested aggregator for viewing counts of OpsData.

parameters.name: ResultAttributes
parameters.description: The OpsData data type to return. (dict) --- The OpsItem data type to return. Name of the data type. Valid value: AWS:OpsItem, AWS:EC2InstanceInformation, AWS:OpsItemTrendline, or AWS:ComplianceSummary.

nested_params.name: TypeName
nested_params.description: Name of the data type. Valid value: AWS:OpsItem, AWS:EC2InstanceInformation, AWS:OpsItemTrendline, or AWS:ComplianceSummary.

nested_items.name: Entities
nested_items.description: The list of aggregated details and filtered OpsData.

nested_items.name: CaptureTime
nested_items.description: The time the OpsData was captured.

nested_items.name: Content
nested_items.description: The details of an OpsData summary.

nested_items.name: NextToken
nested_items.description: The token for the next set of items to return. Use this token to get the next set of results.
